name: Amenities
meta_description: Curated amenities await you at Topping Rose House in the Hamptons. Linens, bath products and more set us apart from the competition. See a full amenity list.
short_description: Topping Rose is luxury in Bridgehampton, with every detail designed for your enjoyment. Our list of elegant amenities makes your stay in the Hamptons delightfully memorable and engaging.
description:
Our curated list of elegant amenities is what makes your stay at the only full-service luxury hotel in the Hamptons so unique. While you’re here, morning coffee with a view and cocktails by the pool allow you to make the most of your time at our historic estate. Relaxing spa treatments and energizing yoga sessions bring a touch of wellness and unhurriedness, while outstanding dining options invite you to linger over each meal. Reserve a ride to the beach and come home to another tranquil evening surrounded by our verdant grounds. Topping Rose is luxury in Bridgehampton, with every detail designed for your enjoyment.

Guest rooms:

  • Bed linens by Frette
  • Bath and beach towels by Matouk
  • Custom robes and throws by SFERRA
  • Hair dryers and in-room safes in all guest rooms
  • Fine herbal bath products by Farmaesthetics
  • Gourmet complimentary snacks and beverages
  • Smart TVs for all streaming platforms
  • Twice-daily housekeeping for daytime and turndown services
  • Complimentary Wifi
  • Complimentary seated breakfast in our Jean-Georges restaurant

Property:

  • Jean-Georges restaurant for all meal periods, including room service
  • 24-hour guest service and concierge assistance
  • 5-mile BMW shuttle service based on availability
  • Beach equipment including umbrellas, chairs, towels and car park passes
  • Bikes for local exploration
  • 24-hour tea and coffee service
  • Heated outdoor swimming pool and hot tub
  • Seasonal cocktail service poolside
  • 24-hour gym space featuring full showers, sauna, Peloton bikes and weights
  • Farmaesthetics treatment studio for select spa services
  • Seasonal valet and bellman service
  • Seasonal group fitness instruction
  • Contemporary art curation throughout property by Winston-Wächter Fine Art
